colorDefinition.label: Outgoing Change (Foreground)
colorDefinition.description: This color is used for the foreground color for resources that have outgoing changes.

colorDefinition.label: Outgoing Change (Background)
colorDefinition.description: This color is used for the background color for resources that have outgoing changes.

fontDefinition.label: %OutgoingChangeFont.label
fontDefinition.description: The font used to display outgoing changes.

colorDefinition.label: %IgnoredResourceForegroundColor.label
colorDefinition.description: This color is used for the foreground color for resources that are ignored from CVS.

colorDefinition.label: %IgnoredResourceBackgroundColor.label
colorDefinition.description: This color is used for the background color for resources that are ignored from CVS.

fontDefinition.label: %IgnoredResourceFont.label
fontDefinition.description: The font used to display resources that are ignored from CVS.
